PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-01802008-01-31,  ,  ,  PSEP, 
ActCustoms Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the PRESENTATION OF PERSONS (2003) REGULATIONS by defining the term commercial goods by adding section 14.1 section specifying that, in certain cases, an authorization to present oneself in an alternative manner is only valid if the person has no commercial goods in their actual possession or in their baggage, and, in other cases, if no commercial goods are on board the conveyance that the person uses to arrive in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0024 Publication Date: 2008-02-20
AttachmentsAttachment
